title: End of game lobby/Champ Select
body:
Hey guys,

was just wondering what the go with the end of game lobby is going to be? One of the best features about the current lobby is the ability to compare damage dealt to champs, towers taken, etc. Are we going to be able to see these stats in the lobby without going to the advanced stats tab?

Also, there seems to be a bit of a delay in all of the functions of champ select and going into the game through the load screen. im not sure if its just me or its happening to everyone so i thought i would let you guys know. The client is looking really good :)

replies.body:
Sorry about the late response. Here's an excerpt from the latest LCU DevBlog:

>**IN PROGRESS** Advanced stats should be viewable without having to go to the web We agree, they should. We're integrating this fix sooner rather than later.

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/client-update/article/6808140c-f26a-4afa-b457-1c435f3f6c14

Hope that answers your question!
I thought it was just me getting these beefy delays, guess not.
I would also like to know has the feature been taken out or is it just not in the alpha yet?
